--- In junit@y..., "alain_ravet" <alain.ravet.list@w...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> I'm about to start some serious Swing development, and I'm looking 
> for some resources, tutorial, best-practices for Swing that go in 
the 
> Test-First-Design, Smart-Model/thin-UI direction.
> 
> I'm not looking for a way to test Swing application (I know about 
> JFCUnit), but rather for 
>    "how-to" build a Swing app test-first, and 
>    "how-to" build smarter models.
> 
> 
> Alain Ravet

If you haven't already you may want to look at Bill Wake's articles:

http://www.xp123.com/xplor/xp0002/
http://users.vnet.net/wwake/xp/xp0001/index.shtml

There is also a chance that an article on test first GUI development 
will be in a upcoming Software Development.
